name: Lead Balloon - v1 Prototype
description:
A prototype for a challenge platformer, created last summer but put on hold. Lead Balloon has a strong focus on traversal puzzles utilizing its core mechanic: Orb.

  • Z/C: Jump
  • X/V: Grab orb if it's nearby
  • X/V + directional input: Throw orb if holding it

Let me know if you'd like to see this project picked back up, and enjoy!
